page.title: 19A day in my life
page.content: On Thursday I get woken up by my budgie,I get up and take the cover off him.I go downstairs to have my breakfast.After breakfast I get ready for school.I put all the things I need for school in my bag.I go back upstairs to see my budgie.We get in the car and go round to nan's.We stay there until ten to nine,then we walk to school. When we get to school I wait outside until it is time to go in.When school is finished we go back to nan's.We watch the television and have tea. When mum comes back from work we go home. I get changed into my ballet stuff and go to ballet. After ballet I go home and watch the television. Then I go to bed. I am Sarah Dear aged 11 years and I go to Dundale Junior School.
